alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Owyhee (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 08 at 7:13PM MST until March 08 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Elmore County in southwestern Idaho... East central Owyhee County in southwestern Idaho... * Until 800 PM MST. * At 711 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Mountain Home Air Force Base, or 8 miles west of Mountain Home, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar, webcams, and surface observations. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel, especially along I-84. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home, Mountain Home Air Force Base, Hammett and C J Strike Reservoir. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
